titleStmt.title: A discourse about the pretious blood and sacrifice of Iesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Thomas, Senior.

notesStmt.note: By Thomas Moore, who has signed the foot of A1v, which is entitled "Christian reader".
A1r is blank; title from caption title, leaf A2r.
Numerous errors in pagination; actual pagination deduced from signature collation.
Annotation on Thomason copy: at foot of A1r: "Nouemb: 6th London 1646".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
